PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-01762021-03-21,  ,  ,  GAC, 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectSpecial Economic Measures (People’s Republic of China) Regulations
PrecisSPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF CHINA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) list one entity and 4 individuals and prohibit persons (individuals and entities) in Canada and Canadians outside Canada from conducting activities and transactions with the People's Republic of China; and (2) raise the costs to the Chinese government of continuing the policies of repression against Uyghurs and other ethnic minorities in the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region (XUAR).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0049 Publication Date: 2021-03-31
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Special Economic Measures (People’s Republic of China) Regulations
precis: SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF CHINA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) list one entity and 4 individuals and prohibit persons (individuals and entities) in Canada and Canadians outside Canada from conducting activities and transactions with the People's Republic of China; and (2) raise the costs to the Chinese government of continuing the policies of repression against Uyghurs and other ethnic minorities in the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region (XUAR).
